Initial Actions Upon Receipt of an Electronic Pre-Discharge Claim
Upon receipt of an electronic claim, pre-discharge claims processors will follow the instructions in the table below.
Step
Action
1
Did the service member submit STRs for the current period of service?
If
yes
, go to the next step.
If
no
, develop for STRs as noted in
M21-1, Part M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.B.3.k
.
2
Does the service member meet the other requirements of the BDD program?
If
yes
, go to the next step.
If
no
,
change the EP 336 to the appropriate non-BDD rating EP, and
go to Step 4.
3
Develop the claim as required by
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.C.1.b
.
4
Process the claim under the FDC Program (or the standard VA claims process if the service member does not qualify for the FDC Program, or any other qualifying program).
Notes
:
For claim types excluded from the BDD program
disregard the processing steps in this table, and
follow the guidance in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.B.1.c
.
For guidance on how to consolidate incremental 400 EPs that are established by the Veterans Online Application Direct Connect following initial receipt of the claim, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 4.A
.
References
:  For more information on
claim types excluded from the BDD program, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.B.1.b
BDD and BDD-excluded (to include claims received electronically) EP and claim labels, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.B.2
, and
the FDC Program, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 2.A
and
B
.
